offers.offer_text: Avail Up to 20% Off on Lords Hotels
offers.title: Up to 20% Discount
offers.description: This discount is applicable on Lords Hotels
offers.terms_and_conditions:
• Get upto 20% Off on Lords Hotels.
  • Offer valid only on Lords Hotels.
  • No promo code required to avail the offer.

eCash process:

  • On successful completion of transaction, your Yatra account will be credited instantly with the relevant eCash.
  • It is advisable to make this transaction after having logged into your Yatra account. In case of non-logged in transactions, the eCash will be credited to your account, basis the email ID used. You can access the Yatra account by the link sent on your email ID.
  • Use your eCash to make online transactions on flight, domestic hotel and bus bookings.
  • Only 5% of your booking amount can be redeemed via the eCash earned from previous bookings on flights, 10% (up to ₹500) on hotels and 10% each on bus and train bookings.
  • The eCash earned through this offer has a validity of 90 days from travel date.

Terms and Conditions

  • App related bookings are valid on Android & iOS devices only.
  • This offer cannot be clubbed with any other offer extended by Yatra as part of any other arrangement.
  • The offer is not applicable where hotel stay has been split into multiple bookings to avail the offer multiple times. Yatra.com reserves the right to cancel such bookings.
  • In case of a cancellation/refund, the offer amount will be deducted from the total refund due.
  • Yatra Online Pvt. Ltd. ("Yatra") reserves the right to add, alter, modify all or any of these terms and conditions, or replace wholly or in part, this offer by any other offer, whether similar to this offer or not, or to withdraw it altogether, without prior notice.
  • Yatra shall not guarantee or be held responsible or liable for any product or service offered by the hotels which is not within the control of Yatra.
  • All purchases made under the program shall be subject to applicable cancellation/date change rules. In case of a cancellation, Yatra shall reverse the discount and shall not provide additional discount to the customer.
  • Decision of Yatra in all matters connected with or incidental to this offer shall be final and binding.
  • Any disputes arising out of this offer shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of competent courts in Gurgaon, Haryana.
  • All other standard terms and conditions available at Yatra.com shall apply.

offers.title: 20% Discount
offers.description: This offer is applicable on Bus Booking (Only on orders using PayZapp wallet. Max. Once per user. Maximum discount applicable is ₹500)
offers.terms_and_conditions:
• The offer will be valid only on online confirmed bookings made through Yatra App or Website.
  • The offer is applicable only on domestic flight, domestic hotels and bus  bookings.
  • Use Promocode ‘****’ on Yatra ‘review flight details’ page while making the booking. In case eligible, instant discount shall be applied. On the payment step, select PayZapp wallet for payment. You will be re-directed to the PayZapp payment page for completing the transaction.
  • Offer valid from December 17 - 31, 2020.
  • Offer is available only for transactions done through either PayZapp linked (VISA/ MasterCard/ Rupay) Debit & Credit Cards.
  • On payments through PayZapp Prepaid Card, offer is applicable only for the PayZapp KYC registered customers.
  • Discounts provided under the offer cannot be clubbed with any other offer or discount extended by Yatra as part of any other arrangement.
  • In case of any refund, the discounted amount will be deducted from the total refund due.
  • All purchases made under the program shall be subject to applicable cancellation/date change rules. In the case of a cancellation, Yatra shall reverse the discount and shall not provide an additional discount to the customer.
  • Yatra.com reserves the right to add, alter, modify all or any of these terms and conditions, or replace wholly or in part, this offer by any other offer, whether similar to this offer or not, or to withdraw it altogether, without prior notice.
  • All tickets would be subject to availability at the time of booking and will be governed by the standard airlines terms and conditions. Cancellation charges/date change penalties will be applicable as per the airlines rules for all tickets purchased through this promotion.
  • Yatra.com shall not guarantee or be held responsible or liable for any product or service offered by the Airlines or Hotels which is not within the control of Yatra.com.
  • The decision of Yatra.com in all matters connected with or incidental to this offer shall be final and binding.
  • All purchases made by the customer at www.yatra.com shall be governed by the standard Terms and Conditions (subject to changes) of Yatra, which includes without limitation User Agreement, Privacy Policy or any other product/service related terms and conditions appearing on Yatra’s website www.yatra.com..
  • All disputes arising out of or in connection with this offer shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the court in Gurugram.
  • Offer is applicable both for a Registered Minimum KYC (Rs10 k) * and Full KYC (Rs 1 Lac) * PayZapp Prepaid Card customers.
  • Minimum KYC means- “It is a wallet that is issued to a user after obtaining minimum details that includes- mobile verification with One Time Pin (OTP), Self-declaration of name, Unique identification number of any of the officially valid document (i.e. PAN). The amount loaded during any month shall not exceed Rs 10,000/- with a max. of Rs 1,00,000/- in a year. The amount outstanding at any point of time shall not exceed Rs 10,000/-. Wallet shall be used only for purchase of goods and services. Fund transfer from wallet to bank accounts and to other wallets shall not be permitted”.
  • Full KYC means- “It is a wallet that can hold a maximum of Rs 1,00,000/- at any given point in time. It is issued only when a user successfully completes KYC process in PayZapp.” KYC for PayZapp users who are also HDFC customer is done basis your existing relationship with HDFC Bank.
  • Customer must be KYC verified user’s throughout the offer period i.e. customer has to be KYC registered user’s during the time of transaction.
  • All standard terms and conditions mentioned on Yatra.com website would apply.
  • All disputes arising out of, or in connection with this offer shall be subject to exclusive jurisdiction of Court at Gurgaon.

offers.offer_text: Escape by Yatra starting at just ₹29900(2 Years accomodation)
offers.title: Escape by Yatra
offers.description: Starts @ ₹29900(2 Years accomodation) only
offers.terms_and_conditions:
In order to avail the membership of Escape by Yatra, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms and Conditions. These Terms and Conditions and List of Properties and Seasons (hereinafter collectively referred to as "Agreement") constitutes the entire and only agreement between Yatra Online Private Limited ("Yatra"/ "We"/"us") and you/ customer ("Member") with respect to the membership of Escape by Yatra as mentioned in clause 1 of these Terms and Conditions ("Membership") and supersedes all prior or contemporaneous agreements, representations, warranties and understandings, whether written or oral, with respect to the Membership. This Agreement may be amended at any time by us from time to time without specific notice to you.

1. Room Credit Entitlement*

By becoming the member of any plan of Escape by Yatra, you are entitled to avail the following benefits:

  1. Room nights on twin occupancy, per year for a duration as per plan selected (each room night shall hereinafter be referred to as "Room Credit");
  2. A child up to the age of 7 years can be accommodated at no extra cost (without additional bed);
  3. A child between the age of 7 years and 12 years can be accommodated without an additional bed at an extra cost as per plan availed, directly payable at the hotel
  4. An individual above the age of 12 years can be accommodated within the same room with an extra bed at an additional cost directly payable at the hotel as per plan availed

Subject to clause 5 of these terms and conditions, you can utilize the Room Credit for all the properties/ resorts/ accommodations ("Property") mentioned in the list of properties provided to you by Yatra. You shall also have the option to split the Room Credit to utilize at the Room Credit at multiple Properties during a year. However, the splitting of Room Credit shall be allowed only once a year, thereby enabling to utilize the Room Credit twice a year, subject to a minimum stay of two (2) nights at each Property.

You shall be eligible to avail the aforementioned benefits after 10 days of receipt of Subscription Fee (hereinafter defined) by Yatra.

2. Payment

Inconsideration of you availing the membership of Escape by Yatra, you hereby agree to pay Yatra a subscription fees as applicable (the "Subscription Fee"). Your Membership shall not be activated unless Yatra receives the Subscription Fee and until you receive a confirmation with respect to the same. You can make a payment of the Subscription Fee using a credit card, debit card, net banking, UPI, Mobile Wallet, PayPal, Cash and Cheque. If your bank/ credit card/ debit card permits, you may also make the payment of Subscription Fee using the EMI option. You would be issued a digital voucher after the payment of subscription fee acknowledging the receipt of payment and you are advised to review and verify the voucher thoroughly and contact Yatra immediately if the voucher appears to be incorrect or incomplete. Yatra will not accept responsibility if we are not notified of inaccuracies within 5 days of sending out the voucher. In the case of errors, Yatra reserves the right to re-issue you the voucher with correct details. Yatra shall share with you the transaction number or Subscription Fee reference number, which shall be quoted while availing the Escape by Yatra membership benefits.

3. Transfer/ Cancellation of Membership

The Membership once purchased cannot be cancelled. However, you shall have the option of transferring the Membership to third party at no cost within 30 days of making payment of Subscription Fee. In order to transfer the Membership to the third party within first 30 days, the transfer request must be made before utilizing the Room Credits.

In case you wish to transfer the Membership after 30 days, the same can only be done during first [three] years of Membership, subject to the payment of the membership transfer fee of INR 5,000 along with applicable GST over it. Upon transferring the Membership to a third party, the Room Credit till the year of the transfer of Membership shall be forfeited and the new owner shall be eligible to get the Room Credits for the remaining period, which shall be calculated on pro-rata basis, rounding off to next number.

In event of death of the Member, the legal heir of the Member can continue to use the Membership upon producing the relationship certificate and death certificate. The legal heir of the Member may transfer the Membership to his/her name by producing the relevant documents, which include providing membership transaction number, producing relationship certificate, death certificate etc.

4. Forfeiture of the Room Credits

You shall have the option to carry forward the Room Credits of the current year to the next year or you may also borrow the Room Credits of the next year in the current year in case you are looking for a longer holiday. However, in case you fail to utilize the Room Credits for 2 or more subsequent years, the Room Credit for all the earlier years except the immediate last year shall be forfeited and you shall not be entitled to avail such Room Credits.

5. Season-wise Restrictions for Utilising the Room Credits*

Depending upon destination and the Property options, the entire year may be categorized into the three categories viz. Normal Season, Peak Season and Black Out. For the detailed information of the Property, and the seasons applicable thereto, you may kindly refer to Annexure A hereof.

  • Room Credits for each season during a year can be utilized in following manner:
  • During the Normal Season, you may avail Room Night Credits for a particular Property as per plan selected;
  • During the Peak Season, you may avail One Room Night Less Credits for a particular Property as per plan selected; and
  • During the Black Out, no nights can be availed for a particular Property.

6. Reservation and Booking

  1. For booking Escape by Yatra plans write to yatraescape@yatra.com a.or call us at our helpline at and 0124-4749367 from 10:00 AM to 7:00 PM Monday to Saturday, except Bank holidays and Public holidays.
  2. In order to utilize the Room Credit and make a reservation at the Property, you may write a mail to us at escapeservice@yatra.com or call us at our helpline at and 0124-4749367 from 10:00 AM to 7:00 PM Monday to Saturday, except Bank holidays and Public holidays;
  3. The bookings to utilize the Room Credit can be made at least 15 days in advance. You shall not be allowed to make bookings before 120 days from the date of check in.
  4. Upon receiving your reservation request, we will try to confirm booking with same Property as requested by you, however, if the Property of your choice is not available, will offer you 3 similar or better alternates to choose from.
  5. Upon confirmation of booking by the Property, booking confirmation voucher will be sent to the e-mail ID provided by you to us at the time of registration , or any other e-mail ID updated by you from time to time.
  6. The room category offered in the Property shall be the base room unless specifically mentioned otherwise
  7. Once the booking is confirmed and booking voucher is shared with you, the booking cannot be cancelled. However, the booking can be amended 15 days prior to the date of check, subject to the payment of a booking amendment fee of INR 1,000 per booking plus GST. On the other hand, Yatra cannot guarantee the availability of the same Property at a later date and you may be offered similar alternatives. Further, the changes are permissible for the same or lower season category.
  8. If on account of certain un-avoidable circumstances, Yatra or the Property is not able to honor reservations for a confirmed booking, a similar alternate arrangement will be made or your account will be credited with twice the number of Room Credit booked, which can be availed during any season of the year except during the Black Out season.
  9. It is mandatory for the "Member" to be part of each and every booking else it will be accounted as gift or transfer of room credit.

7. Gifting or transfer of Room Credit-

You can gift or transfer your Room Credits to your friend or family upon sending a written request signed by both you and the transferee, subject to a transfer fee of INR 1500 per night plus GST

8. General T&Cs-

  1. All reservations under the Membership are on Room only basis, unless otherwise mentioned. You shall be liable to pay at the Property for any additional services availed by you at the Property
  2. The Membership includes only room accommodations and doesn’t cover any transport or sightseeing or activities or anything else until expressed otherwise
  3. For any additional service availed by you at the Property, you shall be required to pay for the addition service at the Property directly.
  4. You acknowledge that Yatra is only acting as an agent facilitating the booking of hotel accommodation services. Thus, actual accommodation services will be provided directly by the Property to the customers and Yatra shall not be liable for the services provided by the Property.
  5. Yatra is not required to issue tax invoice for hotel accommodation services or any additional services utilized by the customer at the Property unless the law specifically requires Yatra to deposit such tax or issue invoices for such supply.
  6. Property shall be responsible for issuing tax invoice on the customer and undertake necessary compliances in respect of hotel accommodation services provided to the customer. Yatra shall merely act as a collection agent for collection of amount from the customers for further remittance of the same to the Property on behalf of customers.
  7. The customers authorize Yatra to collect invoice from the Property on their behalf for settlement of accommodation charges. Yatra will issue an invoice for the service fee/ convenience fee charged from the customers on its own account and same will be made available to the customers at their request.

9. Force Majeure

Yatra reserves the right to cancel, alter, amend, change or modify the bookings before or during the tour in the event when such changes may be necessitated due to unforeseen circumstances or factors beyond our control and Force Majeure events such as strikes, lockdown, pandemic, epidemics, fairs, festivals, sport events, weather conditions, traffic problems, overbooking of hotels/flights, cancellation/ re-routing of flights or railway, closure of /restricted entry at a place of sightseeing. In the event of such aforementioned circumstances, Yatra shall promptly notify you of the same as soon as practicable and endeavor to provide you with available alternative options. We will make reasonable efforts to keep the booking unchanged.

10. Obligations of Member

  1. You shall have to take the risk and responsibility of all your baggage, belongings, currency, valuables, documents and personal effects (collectively "Baggage") at all times during the your stay at Property. Yatra shall under no circumstances be responsible for loss of your Baggage.
  2. Member represent and confirm that the Member is of legal age to enter into a binding contract and is not a person barred from availing the services under the laws of India or other applicable law.
  3. The Member also understands that the services may include certain communications from Yatra as service announcements and administrative messages. The Member understands and agrees that the Services are provided on an "as is" basis and that Yatra does not assume any responsibility for deletions, mis-delivery or failure to store any Member communications or personalized settings.
  4. The Member agrees to: (a) provide true, accurate and complete information about himself and his beneficiaries as required by Yatra to activate the Membership ("Registration Data"); and (b) maintain and promptly update the Registration Data to keep it true, accurate, current and complete. If the Member provide any information that is untrue, inaccurate, not current or incomplete or Yatra has reasonable grounds to suspect that such information is untrue, inaccurate, not current or incomplete, Yatra has the right to suspend or terminate the Membership and refuse any and all current or future use of the Membership.
  5. Furthermore, you grant Yatra the right to disclose to third parties Registration Data to the extent necessary for the purpose of carrying out the services.

11. Disclaimer of Warranties /Limitation of Liability

  1. Yatra has endeavored to ensure that all the information provided by it is correct, but Yatra neither warrants nor makes any representations regarding the quality, accuracy or completeness of any data or information. Yatra makes no warranty, express or implied, concerning the Property and/or its contents and disclaims all warranties of fitness for a particular purpose and warranties of merchantability in respect of services, including any liability, responsibility or any other claim, whatsoever, in respect of any loss, whether direct or consequential, to you or any other person, arising out of or from the use of any such information.
  2. The Property mentioned in list of properties shared with you along with this Terms and Conditions are neither owned nor operated by Yatra thus Yatra shall not have any liability whatsoever for any aspect of the arrangements between the Property and the Member as regards the standards and rendering of services by the Property. In no circumstances shall Yatra be liable for the services provided by the Property.
  3. Yatra is not the service provider and cannot therefore control or prevent changes in the published descriptions or representations, which are always based upon information provided by the Property. Yatra acts only as a facilitator of Bookings and shall not be held liable for any changes, deficiencies, disputes, etc. related to the services being provided by the Property.
  4. Yatra shall be acting as a collection agent vis-a-vis collection of payment and remittance of the same to the Property on behalf of the customers.
  5. Yatra does not, by offering the Membership, represent or warrant that travel to the Property is without risk, and shall not be liable for damages or losses that may result from travel to such Property.
  6. In no event shall Yatra be liable for any indirect, punitive, incidental, special, consequential damages or any other damages resulting from: (a) the use or the inability to use the services; (b) the cost of procurement of substitute goods and services or resulting from any goods, information or services purchased or obtained or messages received or transactions entered into through the services; (c) unauthorized access to or alteration of the Member’s transmissions or data; (d) any other matter relating to the services; including, without limitation, damages for loss of use, data or profits, arising out of or in any way connected with availing services from Yatra. Further, Yatra shall not be responsible or liable for any act of errors, omissions, delay, accident, losses, injuries, death, property damages resulting from any action, inaction, negligence, default or insolvency of any Property.
  7. These limitations, disclaimer of warranties and exclusions apply without regard to whether the damages arise from (a) breach of contract, (b) breach of warranty, (c) negligence, or (d) any other cause of action, to the extent such exclusion and limitations are not prohibited by applicable law.
  8. The maximum liability on part of Yatra arising under any circumstances, in respect of any Services availed, shall be limited up to a maximum of the total Room Credits utilized by the Member for a particular year less any cancellation, refund or others charges, as may be applicable. In no case Yatra shall be liable for any indirect damages including but not limited to consequential loss, incidental or exemplary damages or additional expense whatsoever. In no event Yatra shall be liable for any kind of refunds/returns of charges/fee/fares paid to the Property for rendering the services to the Member.

12. Indemnification

The Member agrees to indemnify, defend and hold harmless Yatra from and against any and all losses, liabilities, claims, damages, costs and expenses (including legal fees and disbursements in connection therewith and interest chargeable thereon) asserted against or incurred by Yatra that arise out of, result from, or may be payable by virtue of, any breach or non-performance of any representation, warranty, covenant or agreement made or obligation to be performed by the Member pursuant to the Membership.

13. GOVERNING LAW

  1. These Terms & Conditions and the relationship between Member and Yatra shall be governed in accordance with the laws of India without reference to conflict of laws principles.
  2. The Member agree that all claims, differences and disputes arising under or in connection with or in relation to the Terms & Conditions or Membership shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts at Gurugram (Haryana) and Member hereby accede to and accept the jurisdiction of such courts.
